channel.title: Question about reseting players. How Do I 100% Reset Someone!
channel.description: ok.. i wanna reset the players but if they want the same name.. and ive tested and even if i delete a character file thats done starter , the reset acc cant do starter again. how do i make it so u can do starter.?

item.title: Question about reseting players. How Do I 100% Reset Someone!
item.dc:creator: @kiamyhelp kiamyhelp
item.description:
@kiamyhelp wrote:

thank you i wish o could rep but i r narb

o and um how do u make it so u dont freeze wen i try to trade a npc

and i no the npc sells stuff bc i looked in shop.cfg

Read full topic
item.source: Question about reseting players. How Do I 100% Reset Someone!

item.title: Question about reseting players. How Do I 100% Reset Someone!
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

Delete the char’s file in characters/ folder AND in the moreinfo/ folder. The starter information is in the moreinfo file.

Read full topic
